name: mqt-movers-calendar-watcher
description: a node serverless function that hits a google calendar on a regular interval to check for added events quantity

scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org brahm-van-houzen-studio --project google-calenda-watcher-node ../../../../.. && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org brahm-van-houzen-studio --project google-calenda-watcher-node ../../../../..

author: brahm van houzen
